QAestro

Ontology-based Orchestration of Question Answering Pipelines

Home QA systems & tasks QA components QAestro results GitHub project

© 2017. All rights reserved.

About QAestro

QAestro is an ontology-based framework to semantically describe QA components and QA developer requirements and to produce QA component orchestrations based on these semantic descriptions.

We introduce an ontology to model QA tasks and exploit the Local-As-View (LAV) approach to express QA components. In addition, QA developer requests are represented as conjunctive queries involving the concepts included in the ontology.

The problem of QA component orchestrations into pipelines can be afterwards cast to the LAV Query Rewriting Problem (QRP) which is further translated into a logical theory. Given the logical theory, state-of-the art SAT solvers (QRP) can find the solution models in the combinatorial space of all solutions which eventually correspond to QA component orchestrations.
